before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"24ntn","text":"To ensure that the observed results are not just random events, use controls, such as undifferentiated IPSCs, to accurately analyze that the antibodies are working as expected. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehca5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r581","text":"Here is an example of how we seed cells onto a 96-well plate. The 96-well has an equal amount of wells of differentiated (blue) and undifferentiated cells (yellow) for analysis. Cells are also counted and seeded at equal densities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alhrs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jlcm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"well_plate_map","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"guid":"7F878C1B7A154F0DA60D8D93B0CE7979","well":[[{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""}],[{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""}],[{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""}],[{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#F0F8FF","Data":"Diff"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"#FEFFE8","Data":"IPSC"},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""}],[{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""},{"Color":"","Data":""}]],"wellColumns":[[{"Color":"","Data":"1"},{"Color":"","Data":"2"},{"Color":"","Data":"3"},{"Color":"","Data":"4"},{"Color":"","Data":"5"},{"Color":"","Data":"6"},{"Color":"","Data":"7"}],[{"Color":"","Data":"A"},{"Color":"","Data":"B"},{"Color":"","Data":"C"},{"Color":"","Data":"D"},{"Color":"","Data":"E"}]]}}}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"13p53","text":"This immunocytochemistry protocol is used for the characterization of IPSC differentiation into motor neurons using several biomarkers: neuroepithelial cells (SOX1), motor neuron progenitors (OLIG2 and NKX2.2), motor neurons (MNX1), and the mature motor neurons (ISL, ChAT, MAP2).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qhuu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl4bu","text":"*Primary and secondary antibody information located in materials section","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a1ks","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33s79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dapr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"t0ae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alc5u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":180.32727272727274,"id":437671,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pmpjb6697.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pmphb6697.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pmpib6697.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pmpgb6697.webp","width":580}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9v8k3","text":"Remove the medium from your cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4skco","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3gbb7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea1aq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bms6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3srgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lh7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ardfe","text":"Tip the vessel towards you and pipette from the bottom corner of the well","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8of3i","text":" ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3onv3","text":"FIX - Dilute 32% Paraformaldehyde solution to 4% PFA in 1X phosphate-buffered saline (PBS) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85uuh","text":"Add 100uL of 4% PFA to each well in the 96-well plate. (1ml if using a 6-well plate). Incubate for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":99,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36qq6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3344l","text":"Remove the fixative solution and wash with 1XPBS at 100ul per well using a multichannel pipette. Repeat 3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g823","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bhgan","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fninf","text":"Aspirate and dispense fixative and wash very slowly, so as to not dislodge your cells. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5rv7u","text":"Move the plate from side to side between each wash ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8sdcb","text":"The fixed sample can be stored, covered in foil, for several days at 4°C if needed.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ub2e","text":"PERMEABILIZE - Add 100uL of 0.5% Triton X-100 to each well of a 96-well (1ml if using 6-well plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"917em","text":"Remove the permeabilization solution and wash 3 times with 1XPBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eig65","text":"BLOCK - Add 100ul of 3% BSA (bovine serum albumin) or blockAid-blocking solution to each well of a 96-well plate slowly to Block. (1ml if using 6-well plate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5lm0","text":"Incubate for at least  (up to overnight) at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lbvc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k5ar","text":"Calculate the amount of primary antibody needed (located in materials section) and dilute in 3% BSA + 0.3% Triton X-100 solution ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ailbf","text":"PRIMARY ANTIBODIES - Remove 3% BSA from wells and add 100uL of primary antibody per well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3qj2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec9b7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84rv3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f2qpr","text":"Make sure primary and secondary antibodies are stored properly. Aliquots should be put in the -20 and thawed once, with any remainder kept at 4°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vap5","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature in a dark place or overnight at 4°C.    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9brt6","text":"(Different primary antibody stains may take longer to stain and could require optimization).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ap85c","text":"Remove primary antibody and wash three times slowly with 1xPBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o5vu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6it1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4p1am","text":"Remember to aspirate and dispense fixative and wash very slowly, so as to not dislodge your cells and continue moving plate side to side between washes. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"12d23","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"774i1","text":"SECONDARY ANTIBODIES - Calculate amount of secondary antibody needed (located in materials section) and dilute in 3% BSA+ .3% TritonX-100 solution and 1:4000 Hoechst. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8ef","text":"Add 100uL per well in 96-well and incubate for at least   at room temperature in a dark place.
